STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Your Personal Chef for Mouthwatering Meals
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay Looped on All Things Culinary
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it, hear from the people using our app every day!
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my cooking routine. The step-by-step guides and recipes make meal prep a breeze.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a novice cook, I was intimidated by complex recipes. But this app breaks everything down so simply. Cooking is fun now!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've tried many cooking apps but none compare to this one. The variety of recipes and intuitive interface keep me coming back.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our app for making foods.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What kind of foods can I make with this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app provides recipes and instructions for all kinds of foods - appetizers, main courses, desserts, and more! You can find recipes for cuisines from around the world.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Do I need to be an experienced cook?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Not at all! The app caters to both beginners and experienced cooks. Recipes have step-by-step guides with photos to make cooking easy.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I save my favorite recipes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, you can create an account and save recipes to your personal cookbook for easy access anytime.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Does the app have nutrition information?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely. Nutrition facts like calories, fat, protein, etc. are provided for every recipe to help you make informed choices.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How can I get the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Our app is available for free download on the App Store and Google Play Store. Just search for 'Cooking Companion' and install it on your mobile device.

SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_CREATE_ACCOUNT_PLACEHO: Join Cookly to unlock delicious recipes
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Unleash your culinary creativity with FoodCraft, the ultimate app for food makers and passionate home cooks. Discover endless recipes, create custom meal plans, and elevate your cooking skills to new heights.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Easily create custom recipes with our step-by-step guide. Drag and drop ingredients, add instructions, and tailor to your taste.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Access thousands of ingredients from around the world. Explore unique flavors and discover new culinary combinations.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Let our app plan your meals based on dietary preferences, schedules, and grocery lists. Save time and reduce food waste.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Get real-time guidance while cooking. Our voice commands and video tutorials ensure perfect execution every time.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Monitor your daily intake of calories, macronutrients, and micronutrients. Customize goals and receive personalized recommendations.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Join a community of food enthusiasts. Share your creations, discover new recipes, and get inspiration from like-minded cooks.
CTA_TITLE: Master the Art of Culinary Creation
CTA_BODY: Unlock your inner chef with our intuitive app that guides you through tantalizing recipes and cooking techniques. Elevate your kitchen game and impress with mouthwatering dishes.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions about Our Cooking App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What types of recipes does the app offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app features thousands of recipes across a wide variety of cuisines and dietary needs. Whether you're looking for quick weeknight meals, gourmet dishes, healthy options, or treats for special occasions, we've got you covered.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I save my favorite recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Absolutely! You can create an account and save all your favorite recipes in one convenient place. The app will also track which recipes you've made before and lets you leave notes and ratings.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Does the app include step-by-step instructions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, all recipes come with detailed step-by-step instructions to guide you through the cooking process. Many also include photos or videos to provide a visual aid.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I adjust ingredients or serving sizes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our app allows you to easily scale recipes up or down to adjust serving sizes. You can also swap out ingredients based on dietary needs or personal preferences.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Discover thousands of delicious recipes, with step-by-step instructions and photos to guide you through every dish.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Customize your meal plan based on dietary preferences, family size, and schedule to make meal prep a breeze.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Automatically generate a shopping list based on your meal plan, ensuring you always have the right ingredients on hand.
